name: Scripter scripts for document (PDF) creation
description:
* Update *

This is now a plugin! Find Organize Documents in the Figma Community plugins.


Scripts useful when using a single Figma page to create a document.


  • The scripts assume all root-level frames are intended to be pages in your document. (Figma's PDF export assumes the same thing.)
  • This file contains the components you will want to use with these scripts. Customize them however you like.
  • Some scripts employ other scripts. For example the createTOC( ) script, which creates a table of contents, calls sortedDocPages( ), numberDocPages( ), and numberSections( ).
  • Ping me if you run into problems (but check the Troubleshooting page first) or if you would like additional features added.
